summary: This document is an internal email from Tazia Smith at Deutsche Bank to several colleagues regarding a meeting agenda for a discussion about entity transfers and investment positions related to Epstein. The email outlines topics to be discussed in the meeting scheduled for October 22, 2013.

events.title: Meeting on Entity Transfer and Position Update
events.description: A meeting scheduled to discuss the transfer of remaining positions and investment objectives related to Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email discusses a meeting agenda related to Epstein scheduled for October 22, 2013.
The agenda includes topics such as entity transfer, investment objectives, and current positions.
Several Deutsche Bank staff members are involved in the discussion, indicating a collaborative effort regarding Epstein's financial matters.
